characterInfo.Aliases: Taln, Talenelat, Talenel'Elin,  Stonesinew, The Soldier[1]
characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance, Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDescription: Talenel is one of the ten Heralds of the Almighty. Called Taln by his fellows and Talenelat or Talenel'Elin in modern Vorin Alethkar, he is known as the Herald of War. He is associated with the number Tenat, the essence Talus, the gemstone Topaz, and the divine attributes of Dependable and Resourceful. He is the founder and patron Herald of the order of the Knights Radiant known as Stonewards.
